rooms.description: A welcoming entrance that aligns with Vastu by having a north-east orientation.
Combined kitchen and living area that allows for a spacious layout with an art deco finish.
A central courtyard ensuring natural light and ventilation, in accordance with Vastu principles.
A spacious bedroom featuring a balcony facing the west for relaxation and sunlight in the evening.
A guest bedroom with a balcony for fresh air and light.

openings.description: Main entrance that aligns with the north-east corner to invite positive energy.
Balconies attached to bedrooms offering west-facing views in accordance with Vastu.
Windows placed strategically around the living area and bedrooms for optimal ventilation.
Entrance to central courtyard ensuring seamless transition between indoors and outdoors.
